title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Collateral Subjects: The Normalization of Surveillance for Mexican Americans on the Border
itunes:title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Collateral Subjects: The Normalization of Surveillance for Mexican Americans on the Border
description: Author Adriana C. Núñez discusses her article, "Collatoral Subjects: The Normalization of Surveillance for Mexican Americans on the Border," published in the October 2020 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
